metadata.hours_of_work: A - SGEU Office 36 - one day off every two weeks

job_posting.ministry_description: The Ministry of Justice and Attorney General is responsible for providing a fair justice system that upholds the law and protects the rights of all individuals in Saskatchewan; promotes safe and secure communities; and provides legal and justice policy advice to government.

qualifications.education_requirements: Typically, the successful candidates in this competition will have developed their knowledge and skills through a related diploma/degree such as a Human Justice Degree, Police studies, paralegal course and have experience in a court/legal environment or an equivalent combination of education and related experience.

additional.diversity_statement: We are committed to workplace diversity.
